code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'../styles/ReviewsSlider.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL;function ReviewsSlider(){const[reviews,setReviews]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/reviews")).then(res=>setReviews(res.data)).catch(err=>console.error('Error fetching reviews',err));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"reviews-slider",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Customer Reviews"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"reviews-container",children:reviews.map((review,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"review-tile",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\"",review.comment,"\" - ",review.name]})},idx))})]});}export default ReviewsSlider;
